LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Myrmecocystus.label: Arachne honey can type
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Myrmecocystus.descript: It is one of the large Arachne insects, and is a large species with a wide range of feeding habits.It can swallow and decompose many unprocessed organisms whole and feed the nest group as Arachne nectar.When other members of the insect group feel starved, they feed from mouth to mouth. and excrete nectar when the honeypot is overflowing. This forms resources that can be used for nest construction.\n\nSeveral Arachne rotisserie species can be bred and managed to assist in nest harvesting and seeding operations.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Myrmecocystus.comps.Co: The lives of Arachne insects continue to move regularly like precision gears.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_ShieldHead.label: Arachne shield species
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_ShieldHead.description: One of the Arachne insects, it has a shell that has developed to cover its head and legs, and periodically sheds it to supply chitin to its nest.\n\nIt can carry, mine, and do construction work, and although its combat ability is mediocre, it has excellent defense power.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_ShieldHead.comps.CompN: The lives of Arachne insects continue to move regularly like precision gears.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_WeaponSmith.label: Arachne craft type
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_WeaponSmith.descriptio: It is one of the Arachne insects, and is mainly responsible for the maintenance of the nest, using its dexterous limbs to handle delicate tasks in the colony. \n\nIt can perform transportation, crafts, and artistic work, and its combat ability is mediocre, but it is extremely vulnerable.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_WeaponSmith.comps.Comp: The lives of Arachne insects continue to move regularly like precision gears.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Fighter.label: Arachne warrior type
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Fighter.description:
One of Arachne's supervisory insects, she is a true warrior in the nest colony.She has a strong plasticity gene and acquires many abilities with the development of science and technology.

She can carry, hunt, and train, and has excellent combat ability and high mobility.

As a supervisory insect, she is able to breed and manage several Arachne acid-eating frugivores. It is a small but extremely strong fighting type, capable of absorbing gunfire and even biting with its acid-containing front jaws in close combat.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Fighter.comps.CompNode: The lives of Arachne insects continue to move regularly like precision gears.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Fighter.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Fighter.tools.1.label: giant sickle
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Facehugger.label: Arachne protozoa species
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Facehugger.description: It is one of Arachne's control insects and is a highly undifferentiated special individual. It can control the host's body through its own neural link canal and emit a psychic signal to make those around it ignore its existence. However, it is extremely vulnerable, so it is difficult to do any proper work before completing the parasitism.\n\nAlthough it can perform all tasks other than research, its combat ability is negligible.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Smokepop.label: Arachne stray mist type
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Smokepop.description: One of Arachne's large insects, it has a huge body covered in a thick shell, and has the ability to summon swarms of insects by spraying pheromones over a wide area.Although its movement speed is slow, it boasts the durability of an armored vehicle during battle.\n\nIt can perform transportation tasks, and has excellent combat ability, defense power, and durability.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Smokepop.comps.CompNod: The lives of Arachne insects continue to move regularly like precision gears.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Smokepop.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Skyraider.label: Arachne sky type
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Skyraider.description:
It is one of Arachne's large insects, and is considered to be an elite among them. With its huge body and proud flight ability, it is the unparalleled ruler of the skies of its nest group.

It can perform transportation work, has excellent combat ability, and exhibits high maneuverability on the battlefield.

As a director insect, it can shoot out sky-like insects at the enemy, and can continue to track and bite the enemy with automatic tracking.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Skyraider.comps.CompNo: The lives of Arachne insects continue to move regularly like precision gears.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_NeuroSwarm.label: Arachne weaving species
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_NeuroSwarm.description: They are one of the Arachne's control insects, and are the most special type of insects.Even though they are under the control of the Empress species, they maintain high intelligence and self-esteem, and are able to build neural networks with each other to perform complex research and calculations.Since they cannot perceive the outside world while performing calculations, they are the ones that should be especially protected among the nest group.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Praetorian.label: Arachne forbidden species
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Praetorian.description:
One of Arachne's control insects, he is an elite soldier and spokesperson carefully selected and bred by the Empress race.He has rare social skills even within the nest, and although he is small in stature, he can be equipped with large weapons, and he can command the insects around him and flexibly respond to any situation on the battlefield.
 
Able to carry, socialize, and perform artistic tasks, they are extremely skilled in combat, and their marksmanship is unrivaled.

As a control insect, they can hatch large numbers of Arachnidium larvae at once, creating a formidable front line.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_Praetorian.comps.CompN: The lives of Arachne insects continue to move regularly like precision gears.
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_MimicNematode.label: Arachne pseudoline species
LanguageData.ArachnaeNode_Race_MimicNematode.descript: Pseudolines are technically classified as Arachneids, and usually take over the bodies of their hosts through parasitism.However, under special circumstances, Arachnesids may cultivate their own bodies for Pseudolines and assist in their colony expansion efforts.\n\nDue to a genetic defect, Pseudolines actually still control unconscious bodies in a parasitic manner, causing them to act solely on instinct and unable to link with the hive mind.
